org.apache.axis2.engine

Interface AxisConfigurator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomAxisConfigurator, FileSystemConfigurator, OSGiServerConfigurator, URLBasedAxisConfigurator, WarBasedAxisConfigurator

    public interface AxisConfigurator

      Engages the global modules specified in the configuration
